mapper.select: select count(*) from hosting where membercnt=#{cnt} or startdate between #{sdate} and #{edate} or enddate between #{sdate} and #{edate} or city=#{target} or location=#{target}
select * from hosting where membercnt=#{cnt} or startdate between #{sdate} and #{edate} or enddate between #{sdate} and #{edate} or city=#{target} or location=#{target} order by num desc
select num, title, picURL, price, category, country, Htype from hosting order by num desc
select avg(price) as price, city from hosting where city=#{city} group by city
mapper.insert: insert into hosting values(HOSTING_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{htype}, #{rtype}, #{roomcnt}, #{membercnt}, #{bedcnt}, #{bathcnt}, #{country}, #{city}, #{location}, #{amenity}, #{rule}, #{condition}, to_date(#{startdate}), to_date(#{enddate}),#{price}, #{category}, #{hname}, #{intro}, #{picurl},NULL)
mapper.select: select Hname from hosting where num =#{num}
